column5: I am a first time canadian fisherman. We are going to Lac Simard in Quebec. I was told by the outfitter that I should stop in Mt. Laurier, Parent, or St. Michelle and get worms….if we want them. Has anyone else had experience in any of these towns…..that might be able to give me a heads up as to where to go to buy a flat of nightcrawlers…..or at least some less expensive than $18 for 8 nightcrawlers…..
